page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: Fashion and beauty is popular in Port Glasgow. Both males and females are very self-conscious about their appearance and like to be up-to-date in the latest fashions. There is only one main fashion boutique in Port Glasgow, this is Baxters in Church Street and King Street. Everyone in Port Glasgow has their own type of dress sense. Almost all of them follow the styles of their pop idols,as portrayed in the{media. There is only one type of gambling which takes place in Port Glasgow, this is bookmaking. There are only two "Bookies" (as it is commonly known) they are Ladbrokes and Tote. There are only two cafes namely The Apollo and Aulds. There are two main restaurants The Little Chef and Fan King a Chinese specialist. {
